sentences.en: Aeons ago, there were deserts where there is now fertile land.
sentences.cn: 现在是肥沃土地的地方在很久很久以前曾是一片片沙漠。

sentences.en: Farmers rotate their crops so that the soil will remain fertile.
sentences.cn: 为保持土壤肥力,农民搞作物轮作.
农民们在肥沃的山谷里耕种。

sentences.en: Most roses like a sunny position in a fairly fertile soil.
sentences.cn: 多数玫瑰在土地肥沃、阳光充足的地方长得最好。

sentences.en: Plants grow well in fertile soil.
sentences.cn: 植物在肥沃的土壤里长势良好.

sentences.en: Seattle is fertile ground for small businesses.
sentences.cn: 西雅图是适合小型企业发展的沃土。

sentences.en: The district is fertile of wheat.
The land is not fertile enough to repay cultivation.
sentences.cn: 这块土地不够肥沃,不值得耕种.

sentences.en: the product of a fertile imagination
The soil here is quite fertile.
The wasteland was transferred into fertile fields.
They used force to banish the natives from the more fertile land.
sentences.cn: 他们使用武力把土著居民驱逐出了比较肥沃的土地。

sentences.en: This leaves fertile soil unprotected and prone to erosion.
sentences.cn: 这会让肥沃的土壤暴露在外，使其容易受到侵蚀。

sentences.en: We have the most fertile soil in Europe.
sentences.cn: 我们拥有欧洲最肥沃的土地。

words.tran_cn: 多产；肥沃；[农经] 生产力；丰饶
[肥料] 肥料；受精媒介物；促进发展者

trans.tran_cn: 肥沃的，能生育的，可繁殖的，想象力丰富的，易于…的
trans.tran_en: fertile land or soil is able to produce good crops
